sentences.sentence: She limped around the verandah, houlding her head at an angle to adjust her vision to only one eye.
sentences.translation: 它一瘸一拐地围着阳台转悠，头歪向一遍，调整只有一只眼的视力。

sentences.sentence: When evening fell, my father would sit out in the verandah facing the garden. I would then be summoned to sing to him.
sentences.translation: 到了晚上，父亲会坐在花园对面的凉台上，我被叫来唱歌给他听。

sentences.sentence: These fins abstract the traditional street verandah whilst aiding control of privacy and light into the spaces within.
sentences.translation: 这些柱抽象化自传统街道外廊，同时也对保护私密性和控制进入室内的光线有所帮助。
